titles.title: Mäṣḥafä gǝnzät “Book of the Funeral Ritual”

shortcontents.shortcontent: I) Mäṣḥafä gǝnzät “Book of the Funeral Ritual” (fols. 3ra-140rb) - Introduction (fols. 3ra-5va) - Discourse of St. Athanasius on death (fol. 8vb), incomplete (only incipit) - Discourse of St. Athanasius on death (fols. 9ra-13rb) - Mäṣḥaf zä-wäḍʾat ʾǝm-ʾIyärusalem “Book that Came from Jerusalem” (fols. 13rb-19rb) - Anonymous homily to be read on all the dead (fols. 20ra-23va), incomplete (incipit missing) - Antiphons (kǝśtät, mäzmur) (fols. 32va-33vb, 56vb-57va, 62va-63ra, 64va-65vb, 68ra-rb, 68vb, 70vb-71vb, 73ra, 74vb-75rb, 78ra-rb, 82ra-rb) - Homily by St. Jacob of Serug for the funeral of priests and deacons (fols. 82vb-86va) - Lǝfafä ṣǝdq “Bandlet of Righteousness” (fols. 117vb-122rb) - Mängädä sämay “Journey to Heaven” (fols. 122rb-123ra).

donors.donor: The names of ʾabunä Gäbrä Ḥawaryat, ʿAmätä ʾIyäsus and ʾabunä Gäbrä Qirqos (fol. 19va, in hand b) Zä-Wäldä Maryam (fol. 86va, in hand a) are written in the supplication formulas.

dcomments.dcomment: 19th cent. (?) Quire II (fols. 9ra-19va) probably dates to a recent period.

txstates.txstate: The Ms. is worn and shows traces of intensive use; many leaves are covered with dirt. The leather cover on the spine is damaged. Fol. 2 is of smaller size. Holes amended on fols. 15, 23, 59, 60, 93. Fols. 138-140 are damaged by insects at the upper margin.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the brown leather cover (at least 7 tools were used: single line fillet, fourfold line fillet, triple circle, criss-cross, triple sine wave, x-form, six pointed cross).

bnothers.bnother: Remains of two pairs of chains of endband stitches at the spine cover. A part of the slit-braid core is visible on the inner side of the front board.

squires.squire:
A(2/fols. 1r-2v) – ፩I(6; s.l.: 1, stub after the first stub; 2, stub after 6/fols. 3r-8v) – <[፪]II(11; s.l.: 10, stub after 1/fols. 9r-19v)> – [፫]III(7; s.l.: 2, stub after 4; 5, stub after 1; 7, stub before 1/fols. 20r-26v) – ፬IV(8/fols. 27r-34v) – ፭V(8; s.l.: 2, stub after 7; 7, stub after 2/fols. 35r-42v) – ፮VI(8/fols. 43r-50v) – ፯VII(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 51r-58v) – ፰VIII(10; s.l.: 2, stub after 9; 9, stub after 2/fols. 59r-68v) – [፩]IX(8/fols. 69r-76v) – ፪X(8/fols. 77r-84v) – ፫XI(8/fols. 85r-92v) – ፬XII(8/fols. 93r-100v) – ፭XIII(8/fols. 101r-108v) – ፮XIV(8/fols. 109r-116v) – ፯XV(8/fols. 117r-124v) – ፰XVI(8/fols. 125r-132v) – ፱XVII(8/fols. 133r-140v).
Quire II was added later to substitute the lost text. The sequence of quire marks is interrupted at 8 and started again with numeral 1.

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

phandwritings.phandwriting: Hand a: mediocre; Hand b: fine and regular.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: Hand a: fols. 3ra-8vb, 20ra-140rb. Hand b: fols. 9ra-19va.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; names of the donors; a few lines on the incipit page of the text, alternating with black lines; incipit of each section of the Text; names of Hebrew letters in Ps. 118 (e.g., fols. 35vb, 36ra, 39rb); abbreviations; elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals; some other words, wä-kaʿǝbä (e.g., fols. 6rb, 7ra), ṣällǝyu (e.g., fols. 6va, 8ra), halle luya (e.g., fols. 9rb, 10rb), wä-yǝbälu (e.g., fols. 14rb, 15va), kǝśtät (fol. 73ra), qǝdmä wangle (e.g., fols. 75rb, 78rb), ʾǝgäle (fol. 91vb).

abbreviations.abbreviation: ይ፡ ሕ፡ for ይበሉ፡ ሕዝብ፡ (e.g., fols. 29rb, 68vb, 76ra) ይ፡ ዲ፡ for ይበል፡ ዲያቆን፡ (e.g., fols. 29rb, 31rb, 38rb) ይ፡ ካ፡ for ይበል፡ ካሕን፡ (e.g., fol. 29rb, 31rb, 68vb) ሃ፡ሃ፡ሃ፡ for ሃሌ፡ ሉያ (e.g., fols. 29vb, 30ra, 31rb) ፍ፡ for ፍትሕተ፡ ወንጽሕተ፡ ረስዮ፡ ለዝንቱ፡ በድን፡ (fols. 39ra, 43ra)

extras.extra: - Pen trial: fols. 1r, 2r, 3r. - Tämälläs-sign indicating the place where the omission, written in the upper margin, belongs: fol. 20ra. - The note ዝመጽሐፍ፡ ዘቅዱስ፡ ሚካኤል፡ is written on fol. 140v. - The word ዘዘወትር is written in red in the upper, inner or outer margin: e.g., fols. 8vb, 28va, 44v. - Compressed script: fols. 32va-34vb, 56vb-57va, 62va-63ra, 64va-65vb, 68ra-rb, 68vb, 70va-71vb, 73ra, 74vb-75rb, 78ra-rb, 82ra-rb. - Names are erased from the supplication formula: fols. 92ra, 93vb, 99ra. - Space for rubricated names left unfilled in the supplication formula: e.g., fols. 24v, 29vb. - The word እገሌ is marked above and below by thin broken lines: e.g., fols. 78vb, 79rb, 119va. - Immediate corrections marked dashes above and below the words: fols. 64va. - Minor notes: fols. 4r, 7r, 22r, 93v, 140r.

txquiremarks.txquiremark: - Decorated quire marks are written in the upper left margin of fols. 3r, 27r, 35r, 43r, 51r, 59r, 77r, 85r, 93r, 101r, 109r, 117r, 125r, 133r.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Notes in the upper margin referring to the content of the Ms.: fols. 27v, 29v, 35v, 38v, 39r, 41r, 53v, 57v, 58v, 60r, 63v, 65v, 69r, 74r, 76r, 78r, 79r, 94r, 107v, 110v, 114r, 115r, 125r, 127r, 128v, 130r. - A coloured thread has been inserted in the upper margin of fol. 130.
